*div1 type="summary"* *p*Martin F. Maher to Austin, June 4, 1825. Administration of estate of David J. Marple.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*New Orleans*/location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="06-04-1825">June 4th 1825*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Stephen F. Austin Esqr.*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Sir Being appointed *person_mentioned*Agent */person_mentioned*by the *person_mentioned*widow of the Late David J Marple*/person_mentioned* (Deceased) to settle up his concerns in your *location_mentioned*Colloney*/location_mentioned*, and my Business here, not permitting my leaveing *location_mentioned*Home */location_mentioned*this season, I have appointed *person_mentioned*Mr Mathew Adams my Atty*/person_mentioned* to act for *person_mentioned*Mrs. Marple*/person_mentioned* in my place, and forward by this Gentleman *person_mentioned*Mrs Marple*/person_mentioned*s Power of Atty to me, and mine to him, together with a letter from *person_mentioned*Mrs M*/person_mentioned* to yourself, and sundry letters from *person_mentioned*Mr. Cummings*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Mr. Tomblison*/person_mentioned* to her, relative to her *person_mentioned*late Husband*/person_mentioned*s Personal Effects, *person_mentioned*Mrs. Marple*/person_mentioned*, as also myself, rely with Implicit confidence on your friendly aid and assistance in seeing that Justice is done hir and Three *person_mentioned*Orphan Children*/person_mentioned*, in Leequidating, the Accts of her *person_mentioned*late Husband*/person_mentioned*, with these Gentlemen—I have instructed *person_mentioned*Mr Adams*/person_mentioned* to be soly guided by your instructions in all his movements with *person_mentioned*Mr Cummings*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Tomblisons*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*The *person_mentioned*Widow */person_mentioned*is very desirous to have the Deed of the Lands Granted to her *person_mentioned*late Husband*/person_mentioned* executed in doing of which her wish is to have it so that an Equal Share will be comeing to each of his three *person_mentioned*Children */person_mentioned*and that part allowed for herself separate—as her Object at present is to get more *person_mentioned*settlers */person_mentioned*on it for a term of years untill herself and *person_mentioned*Children */person_mentioned*Can move on to it—I have promised *person_mentioned*Mrs Marple*/person_mentioned* to procure a number of *person_mentioned*settlers */person_mentioned*from *location_mentioned*Urope */location_mentioned*to go on to it next seoson—Which shall Be Complyed with as soon as the Deeds are Received, and I am Justafied in sending over for them; all of which I trust will be accomplished on the return of *person_mentioned*Mr Adams*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*I would also wish to have a statement from yourself, the terms on which *person_mentioned*famileys */person_mentioned*wd Be admitted to settle on your *location_mentioned*lands*/location_mentioned*—the articles of produce that can be raised there, the Laws that you are Governed by, if any Taxes are to be paid, what *person_mentioned*Mechanicks */person_mentioned*are most wanted, with any other Information you think proper to communicate as on sending for *person_mentioned*settlers */person_mentioned*for *location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Mrs. Marple*/person_mentioned*s tract*/location_mentioned* and the terms you admitt *person_mentioned*settlers */person_mentioned*on will Justify me in encouraging twenty or thirty additional *person_mentioned*Families */person_mentioned*to accompany them, I will do so And I have very little Doubt, if once the Ice is broke there will be a number of *person_mentioned*Families */person_mentioned*over every year. If on the receipt of *person_mentioned*Mrs. Marple*/person_mentioned*s Documents and your Information on the subject of *person_mentioned*New settlers*/person_mentioned* are satisfactory, I calculate by *date_mentioned n="Spring-1826">next spring*/date_mentioned* to accompany A number of *person_mentioned*New Settlers*/person_mentioned* to *location_mentioned*yr Quarter */location_mentioned*and spend afew weeks there untill they get fairly under way—*/p*
*p*I beg leave once more to call your attention to *person_mentioned*Mrs. Marple*/person_mentioned*s affairs as I assure you she is Left very destitute, and is wholly depending on her *person_mentioned*friends*/person_mentioned*—which must be very distressing to a *person_mentioned*woman*/person_mentioned*, who never new before her *person_mentioned*Husband */person_mentioned*left home what it was to want for any thing necessary to her comfort.*/p*
*p*Hoping Shortly to hear from you and by that means, be instrumental in forwarding her agreeable News. I Remain Sir yrs. very Respectfully*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Martin F Maher*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*/div1*
